about: Since its establishment in 2007, our company, driven by a spirit of knowledge and innovation, has been a pioneer in various fields in Turkey. In addition to providing consultancy in research and development, machinery and mechanism design, mechatronics, servo motor applications, energy-saving practices, software development, and automation, we also offer services in production with various brands in different sectors. Furthermore, we specialize in factory automation and ERP integration, contributing to Turkey's firsts throughout its existence.
